scene.name: Yuffie

h4.a: Mythril Mine: A Run In with the Turks

scene.p: Travelling across the grasslands from Kalm, Cloud and the others come across a chocobo farm. In a pen outside, several chocobos are walking about.

Chocobo
Wark!
Wark? Warkwark wark?

Cloud
- Wark
- Warrrk
The chocobos perform a sort of waltz.

Chocobo
Wark-----
Received "Choco/Mog" Materia!

Chocobo
Wark!! Wark!!
They go inside the house, where they find the owner of the farm.

Choco Bill
Thinking of crossing the marshes?

Cloud
- Yeah
- Not interested

Choco Bill
Hmm, then it'll probably be safer for you to get a Chocobo.
That way you can zip through the marshes with the Chocobo.
It's the only way to avoid being attacked by the Midgar Zolom.
Midgar Zolom...?
It's a serpent-like creature over 30 feet tall!!
It picks up on footsteps that enter the marshes...
And then, BAM!! It attacks!!!
To avoid that, buy a Chocobo at the Choco Bill & Choco Billy Chocobo Farm.
To purchase a Chocobo, please talk to my grandson. He's in the Chocobo stables at the far right end of the farm.
By the way, there was another person heading towards the Marshes.
Without a Chocobo, the Midgar Zolom probably got him. It was a man in a Black Cape.

Choco Bill
Hmm, then, I guess that's that.
Cloud goes to the stables, where two children are tending to the chocobos.

Chole
Welcome.

Choco Billy
Do you want a Chocobo?

Cloud
Mmm......
- Give me one
- Nope

Choco Billy
You old folks are out of luck!

Cloud
Old folks...?

Billy
We're all out of Chocobos. I'm taking care of those ones out there for someone else.
You know, if you really want a Chocobo, you should go out and catch one.
Want to know how to catch a Chocobo?

Cloud
- Where are they?
- How do I catch one?
- What else?
- Not interested

Choco Billy
You see those claw prints out there? Wild Chocobo's will appear in those areas.
But, if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They very cautious animals by nature.

Cloud
- Chocobo Lure?
- Go on

Choco Billy
'Chocobo Lure' is a type of materia which attracts Chocobos.
If you equip this, they'll come to you. But, without it, they won't appear.
Back to the tutorial menu; Cloud can ask any of his initial questions again.

Choco Billy
A wild Chocobo always appears with other monsters.
But, you won't be able to catch it because of the monsters.
That is why you must defeat the monsters first before you catch the Chocobo.

Cloud
- And then?
- That all you can talk about?

Choco Billy
Also, wild Chocobos are really cautious. They'll run away from the slightest things.
But, if you use 'Greens' They'll focus on that, and won't run away.

p.span: That all you can talk about?

scene.p: Back to the tutorial menu; Cloud can ask any of his initial questions again.

Choco Billy
Whatever you do, don't make Chocobos angry. They're usually calm, but if you get them angry, you'll get hurt.
Oh, and remember, once you get off a Chocobo, it'll escape.

Choco Billy
Well then, shall we get down to business?
I'll sell you the 'Chocobo Lure' for 2000 gil, right now.
You want it?

Cloud
- Buy it
- Don't buy it

Choco Billy
Thanks!
It wouldn't hurt to buy some 'Greens' either.
Oh, and how fast a Chocobo'll finish eating depends of what type of 'Greens' you feed them.

Choco Billy
Mmmm, if you don't have it, you'll never catch one.

Choco Billy
Oh, I'm so glad!

Chole
Wasn't it really expensive?
But don't be mad at my brother or Grandpa.
Ever since dad and mom died, it's been like this...
After leaving the farm, Cloud catches a chocobo and they cross the marshes, avoiding the Midgar Zolom. On reaching the other side, they find the giant snake impaled on a dead tree and stop to stare.

Cloud
Did Sephiroth... do this......?

blockquote.p:
Barret
This Sephiroth guy's pretty strong, I'd say.

Aerith
Our enemy is someone that could do this...?

Tifa
Amazing...

Red XIII
It's a power that we should respect...

scene.p: Moving on past this display of power, they enter the Mythril Mines. After navigating through the tunnels, they come across an open cave, where they run into Rude of the Turks.

Rude
Just a second!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Wh, who are you!?

Aerith
By any chance, are you...?

Tifa
Who are you?

Red XIII
...... I hoped I'd never see you again...

scene.p:
Rude
Do you know who I am?

Cloud
- From the Turks, right?
- Not interested

Rude
Well if you know, then this won't take long.

Rude
......I'm from the Turks. And don't you ever forget it.

Rude
It's difficult to explain what the Turks do...

Cloud
Kidnapping, right?

Rude
To put it negatively... you could say that.
...But, that's not all there is to it, anymore.
............
............

Elena
Sir!
It's all right, Rude! I know you don't like speeches, so don't force it!

Rude
...Then Elena, explain.

Elena
I'm the newest member of the Turks, Elena. Thanks to what you did to Reno, we're short of people.
...Although, because of that, I got promoted to the Turks, ...
In any case, our job is to find out where Sephiroth is headed.
And to try and stop you every step of the way.
Wait a minute, it's the other way around... You're the ones that are getting in our way.

Tseng
...Elena. You talk too much.

Elena
Mr. Tseng!?

Tseng
No need to tell them about our orders.

Elena
Sorry... Tseng.

Tseng
I thought I gave you other orders.
Now go. Don't forget to file your report.

Elena
Oh! Right!
Very well, Rude and I will go after Sephiroth, who's heading for Junon Harbor!

Tseng
...Elena. You don't seem to understand.

Elena
Oh! I'm, I'm sorry...

Tseng
...Go. Don't let Sephiroth get away.

Rude & Elena
Yes sir!
They make their way for the exits. Rude turns back.

Rude
...Reno said he wanted to see you after the injuries you gave him healed.
He wants to show his affection for you all... with a new weapon.
Rude leaves.

Tseng
Well, then...

p.span: If Aerith is in the party...

scene.p:
Tseng
Aerith... Long time no see.
Looks like you got away from the Shinra for a while, now that Sephiroth reappeared.

Aerith
...so what are you saying? That I should be grateful to Sephiroth?

Tseng
No...
Well, I won't be seeing too much of you, so take care.

Aerith
...strange, hearing that from you.

Tseng
Well then, stay out of Shinra's way.

p.span: If Aerith is not in the party...

scene.p:
Tseng
...Where's Aerith? She's not with you?

Cloud
Aerith isn't with us. She's with the others.

Tseng
Oh... Then give her my regards.
Tseng leaves, and Cloud and the others continue out of the mines.

Passing through the forests on the way to Junon, they run into a "mystery ninja," who attacks them. After being defeated, she lies on the ground with the party standing around her. There's a save point nearby.
* Note: Because you can pick up Yuffie at almost any time in the game, I've included every character's reaction here.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Wassup with that broad?

Aerith
Who is that girl...?

Tifa
Cloud, do you know her?

Red XIII
...You don't see ones like that everyday...
Who is that girl? She's still a child.

Cait Sith
Who do you think it is? I didn't recognize the face.

Vincent
She has a mysterious weapon... I've seen her somewhere before...

Cid
Who is that kid!

p.span: Cloud walks to the save point.

scene.p: After exiting the Menu screen, they find that the ninja has disappeared.

Yuffie
Haa----ah! Gotcha! And you deserve it, too!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, we been had! And... my money!

Aerith
Hmm... Hey, don't we have less money than what we had?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her?
Hey! My money!

Red XIII
Hey! My emergency money!

Cait Sith
Gil, gil, gil, where's my gil!?

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.
Hmm? ......pretty fast.

Cid
What the--!? Gone! It's gone! My money's gone!

scene.p: 200 Gil Stolen!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Shit!! Gimme back my money!!

Aerith
Geez!! You shouldn't do this!!

Tifa
Wait a second! Where's my money!?

Red XIII
Give... give back what is rightfully mine!

Cait Sith
Hey, you can't--! My gil, give it back--!

Vincent
The Gil doesn't seem to be her real objective...

Cid
Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
Just remember who you're dealin' with, punk!!

scene.p: Yuffie sits up.

Yuffie
Man...... I can't believe I lost...
She jumps up.

Yuffie
You spikey-headed jerk! One more time, let's go one more time!
Or, if Tifa is party leader:
Hey, boobs! Try that again! Just one more time!
Or, if Cid is party leader:
Hey, you bow-legged ol' man! Give me another chance! I'll fight ya again!

td.p:
Tifa
- What did you say!?
- Don't fight

Cid
- Give her a lickin'
- Forget it!

scene.p:
Yuffie
I won't lose this time! Take your time and get ready. Holler when you're ready!

She shakes her fist at Cloud.
At this point, it's not possible to talk to her again, so you have to check the Menu screen. Afterwards, they find that Yuffie has disappeared.

Yuffie
No way I'm going to fight with punks like you more than once!
I'll keep enough for the doctor bill! Next time, you won't be as lucky!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, we been had! And... my money!

Aerith
Hmm... Hey, don't we have less money than what we had?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her?
Hey! My money!

Red XIII
Hey! My emergency money!

Cait Sith
Gil, gil, gil, where's my gil!?

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.
Hmm? ......pretty fast.

Cid
What the--!? Gone! It's gone! My money's gone!

scene.p: 200 Gil Stolen!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Shit!! Gimme back my money!!

Aerith
Geez!! You shouldn't do this!!

Tifa
Wait a second! Where's my money!?

Red XIII
Give... give back what is rightfully mine!

Cait Sith
Hey, you can't--! My gil, give it back--!

Vincent
The Gil doesn't seem to be her real objective...

Cid
Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
Just remember who you're dealin' with, punk!!

scene.p:
Yuffie
Thinkin' of running away? Stay and fight! FIGHT, I said!
C'mon...... What's the matter?
You're pretty scared of me, huh!?

td.p:
Cid
- Something like that
- You're wasting your time

scene.p:
Yuffie
Hmm, just as I thought. What do you expect with my skills?
Good luck to you guys too. If you feel up to it, we can go another round. Later!
I'm really gonna leave! REALLY!

td.p:
Cloud
- Go ahead...
- Wait a second!

Tifa
- Yeah, so?
- Wait a second!

scene.p:
Yuffie
Oh yeah? Then do whatever you want!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Gone... Wassup with that?

Aerith
She's gone... So what was that all about?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her...?

Red XIII
Huh? She's gone...... What is she doing?

Cait Sith
...She disappeared... I don't have a clue what was going on.

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.

Cid
She's gone, hey...... What's with that kid!?

td.p:
Yuffie
What is it, you still have somethin' for me?
......Hmmm. So is that it?
I know you want my help because I'm so good!
You want me to go with you?

Yuffie
What, you still want somethin'?
...Hmm. So is that it?
You want my help 'cause I'm so good!
You want me to go with you! Is that what you're saying?

scene.p:
Yuffie
Heh heh... thought so. You put me in a spot. Hmm, what should I do?
But if you want me that bad, I can't refuse...
If Tifa or Cid are party leader, the above line is slightly different:

But if you want me that bad, I can't really say no...
All right! I'll go with you!

td.p:
Tifa
- What's your name?
- Come on, let's hurry!

Cid
- What's your name?
- Come on, or we'll leave you!

scene.p:
Yuffie
Me? The name's......
After you select her name, she's gone.

Yuffie
What are you talking about!? You're the one who should go first!
Okay forget it! I'm not going with you!
Remember, if you piss me off... it'll cost you!!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, we been had! And... my money!

Aerith
Hmm... Hey, don't we have less money than what we had?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her?
Hey! My money!

Red XIII
Hey! My emergency money!

Cait Sith
Gil, gil, gil, where's my gil!?

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.
Hmm? ......pretty fast.

Cid
What the--!? Gone! It's gone! My money's gone!

scene.p: 700 Gil Stolen!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Shit!! Gimme back my money!!

Aerith
Geez!! You shouldn't do this!!

Tifa
Wait a second! Where's my money!?

Red XIII
Give... give back what is rightfully mine!

Cait Sith
Hey, you can't--! My gil, give it back--!

Vincent
The Gil doesn't seem to be her real objective...

Cid
Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
Just remember who you're dealin' with, punk!!

scene.p: Cloud and the others just start walking away.

Yuffie
Huh? Hey...HEY!
Wait! I haven't even told you my name......
I'm Yuffie! Good to meetcha!
She turns away.

Heh heh...... just as I planned.
Now all I have to do is... a little this...... and a little that...... nyuk, nyuk, nyuk......
She turns back and runs after them.

Hey, wait up! Wait for me!!
Here, I'll give you back the money I've stole from you!
......or, uh, what's left of it.

Yuffie
Oh yeah? Then do whatever you want!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Gone... Wassup with that?

Aerith
She's gone... So what was that all about?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her...?

Red XIII
Huh? She's gone...... What is she doing?

Cait Sith
...She disappeared... I don't have a clue what was going on.

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.

Cid
She's gone, hey...... What's with that kid!?

scene.p:
Yuffie
Wh... what!?
Uuuuugh! Now I'm really mad!
Make fun of me, will ya! Just watch!!
Yuffie runs off.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, we been had! And... my money!

Aerith
Hmm... Hey, don't we have less money than what we had?

Tifa
She's gone... What is it with her?
Hey! My money!

Red XIII
Hey! My emergency money!

Cait Sith
Gil, gil, gil, where's my gil!?

Vincent
...... Difficult to understand her motivation.
Hmm? ......pretty fast.

Cid
What the--!? Gone! It's gone! My money's gone!

scene.p: 500 Gil Stolen!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Shit!! Gimme back my money!!

Aerith
Geez!! You shouldn't do this!!

Tifa
Wait a second! Where's my money!?

Red XIII
Give... give back what is rightfully mine!

Cait Sith
Hey, you can't--! My gil, give it back--!

Vincent
The Gil doesn't seem to be her real objective...

Cid
Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
Just remember who you're dealin' with, punk!!

scene.p: With the eventual addition of another party member, Cloud and the others continue on their way.
